data.actual_result: It creates a new line in the text box if empty and if it already has characters typed holding enter will send the message
data.expected_result: Shouldn't do anything except maybe opening the image a bunch of time as of a known bug
data.short_description: Holding the enter key while viewing an image will interact with the text box behind
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an image and click on it - While viewing the image hit and hold the enter key
